method.name: quickpatch
method.digest: Quickly add a number of universes to the configuration
method.description: Quickly add a number of universes to the configuration

method.name: add_universe
method.digest: Adds a universe to the configuration
method.description: Adds a universe to the configuration

method.name: get_fixture_manager
method.digest: Gets a pointer to the fixture manager
method.description: Gets a pointer to the fixture manager

method.name: clear_universes
method.digest: Removes all universes from the configuration
method.description: Removes all universes from the configuration

method.name: remove_universe
method.digest: Removes a universe from the configuration
method.description: Removes a universe from the configuration
